languages.text: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}
languages.original_text: Обладатель посоха (уровень 9) получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Оковы. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}

languages.text: 这根法杖（力量等级9）的使用者获得灵能束缚{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

traits.locale_text: 这根法杖（力量等级9）的使用者获得灵能束缚{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的伤害。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}

languages.text: この杖の使い手（パワーレベル9）は拘束{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に影響を及ぼす。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

traits.locale_text: テレキネシストの杖（パワーレベル9）を装備すると拘束{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得。同アビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}でも使用可能。パワーレベルはこのパワーのダメージに作用する。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+10

languages.text: El portador de este báculo (nivel de poder 9) gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Enlace. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de este poder. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

traits.locale_text: El portador de este báculo (nivel de poder 9) gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Enlace. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al daño de este poder. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}

languages.text: Der Führer dieses Stabes (Energiestufe 9) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Binden. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieser Fähigkeit. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

traits.locale_text: Der Führer dieses Stabes (Energiestufe 9) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Binden. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den Schaden dieser Fähigkeit. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}

languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton (niveau de puissance 9) bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Liaison. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés dépendent du niveau de puissance. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton (niveau de puissance 9) acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Liaison. Les versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte Héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure Désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Le niveau de puissance détermine les dégâts infligés. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}
